faq.q: How to choose the right fire extinguisher for an office?
faq.a: For office spaces, we typically recommend powder fire extinguishers with a capacity of 4-8 liters. When selecting, consider the total area, number of floors, and presence of electrical equipment. Our specialists will help you choose the most suitable option for your specific needs.

faq.q: What documents are needed for bulk PPE purchases?
faq.a: For wholesale purchases, we'll need your company details and an authorization letter for receiving goods. We'll prepare all necessary documentation including delivery notes, invoices, and product compliance certificates.

faq.q: How long does it take to install a fire alarm system?
faq.a: Installation time depends on the facility size and system complexity. On average, a standard fire alarm system installation takes between 1-5 working days. Exact timelines are determined after our specialist surveys your premises.

Yes, all our equipment comes with a minimum 1-year warranty. The warranty period may vary depending on the product type and manufacturer. Detailed warranty terms are provided in the product documentation and warranty certificate.

faq.q: Do you deliver to other regions of Uzbekistan?
faq.a: Yes, we deliver to all regions of Uzbekistan. Delivery time and cost depend on your location. Free delivery may be available for orders above a certain amount.

faq.q: How often should fire extinguishers be serviced?
faq.a: Fire extinguishers should undergo maintenance at least quarterly. Powder extinguishers require recharging every 12-18 months, while CO2 extinguishers need servicing every 5 years. Our team will remind you when your equipment is due for maintenance.

faq.q: How to choose a fire extinguisher?
faq.a: The choice of fire extinguisher depends on the type of potential fire. We'll help you select the optimal option for your needs.

faq.q: How often should fire extinguishers be recharged?
faq.a: Fire extinguishers require recharging at least once every 1-5 years depending on the type and operating conditions.

faq.q: What documents are needed to place an order?
faq.a: For individuals, a passport is sufficient. For legal entities, company details and a power of attorney for signing documents are required.
